meta.title: new-home-who-dis - The Ultimate Housewarming

comingSoon.title: COMING SOON
comingSoon.description: The most aggressive, satirical, and utterly ridiculous gift registry experience is coming to ruin your peaceful shopping experience.

items.label: Features:
items.value: Real-time updates, tier-based perks, balcony smoking management

features.title: Aggressive UX
features.description: Popups, fake urgency, and dark patterns that are somehow still functional

features.title: Competitive Gifting
features.description: Bronze to Ultra tiers with real party perks (including bathroom priority!)

features.title: Mobile-First

features.title: TV Display Mode

warning.title: Warning
warning.text: This website contains satirical dark patterns, aggressive UX, and functional gift commitment systems. Side effects may include excessive shopping, competitive anxiety, and uncontrollable laughter. Consult your wallet before use.

footer.message: Brought to you by questionable design decisions and genuine hospitality
footer.finePrint: No actual data will be harvested for evil purposes. Probably.
